test_profile.name: T2D Weight Loss
test_profile.description: 45-year-old male with Type 2 Diabetes, overweight, goal: weight loss

carbohydrates_percent.note: Maximum 45% of total calories from carbohydrates

saturated_fat_percent.note: Maximum 7% of total calories from saturated fat

monounsaturated_fat_percent.note: Minimum 10% from monounsaturated fats (olive oil, nuts)

magnesium_mg.note: 400-420mg per day for men (420mg for 31+ years)

notes: Limit salty condiments; sodium max 2300 mg.
